column2: What is the title of the study?
column3: What is the name of the aquifer(s) focused on in the study?
column4: What are the future work recommendations for this study?

column2: The title of the study is "Executive Summary NEW MEXICO BUREAU OF GEOLOGY AND MINERAL RESOURCES."
column3: The aquifer report does not explicitly name a specific aquifer within the Tularosa Basin. The study focuses on the general geology and groundwater characteristics of the Tularosa Basin itself.
column4:
The future work recommendations for this study include:
1) Suggesting further research to improve understanding of groundwater salinity in the Tularosa Basin.
2) Addressing spatial and temporal data gaps by collecting additional water quality samples.
3) Providing a more comprehensive assessment of fresh and brackish water resources using all available data.
